snowman.name: Snowman
snowman.effect: Give the {{frozen}} alteration to a character.

yeti.name: Yeti
yeti.effect: When this character gains the {{frozen}} alteration, gain 2 permanent points.

witch.name: Witch
witch.effect: Give the {{frozen}} alteration to an ally.

ancestor.name: Ancestor
ancestor.effect: Remove an alteration from a character and gain 1 permanent point.

merchant.name: Merchant
merchant.effect: Exchange your hand with another player's hand.

beast.name: Beast
beast.effect: X equals the number of allies with one or more alteration

lizard.name: Lizard
lizard.effect: Remove up to 3 alterations to enemies in {{front}} position or allies.

giant.name: Giant
giant.effect: At the end of your turn, give the {{frozen}} alteration to an ally.
